about_the_game:
Ruins To Fortress - Survivor’s Pack DLC


Elevate your experience in Ruins To Fortress with the Survivor's Pack DLC, a must-have for dedicated players who want to stand out on the battlefield while helping to shape the future of the game. This exclusive DLC not only provides unique in-game bonuses, but also directly supports the ongoing development of new content and features, ensuring that the world of Ruins To Fortress continues to evolve and grow.

DLC Features

Exclusive Skin Pack: Stand out in the unforgiving world of Ruins To Fortress with an exclusive set of skins available only to Survivor’s Pack owners. Customize your character and gear with unique visual styles that show your commitment to survival and mastery.

Free Skins: As a Survivor's Pack owner, you'll automatically receive one free skin from every new skin pack released during the offer period. To claim the free skin, you must launch the game while the skin pack is available. This does not apply retroactively. Ensure you’re always equipped with fresh looks to dominate the battlefield.

Shadow Wolf Companion: Guard your home with the ever-watchful Shadow Wolf by your side. This mystical creature remains at your base, protecting your treasures and territory while you're away. With its sleek, dark fur and glowing eyes, the Shadow Wolf stands vigilant in the shadows, ensuring no intruder dares to approach. This is a skin for the dog companion.

Back Wall Tiles: Transform your base with a wide variety of new back wall tiles available exclusively in the Survivor's Pack DLC. Whether you want to create a cozy retreat or a fortress of solitude, these tiles allow for endless customization and personalization, giving your base a unique flair. Build and decorate your stronghold like never before, ensuring every inch reflects your style and survival prowess.

Seasonal Event Skins: Celebrate the seasons with exclusive event skins provided for free to Survivor's Pack owners. These limited-time skins are a great way to show off during special events and holiday-themed updates.

Our Sincere Thanks: By purchasing the Survivor’s Pack, you’re not just enhancing your own gameplay experience—you’re also helping us continue to develop Ruins To Fortress. Your support is crucial for future updates, expansions, and improvements, and we deeply appreciate your contribution.


The Survivor’s Pack DLC is more than just a collection of perks; it’s a way to invest in the future of Ruins To Fortress. Whether you’re a seasoned player or just starting out, this DLC offers both practical benefits and the satisfaction of knowing you’re helping to build something incredible.

Join the ranks of the most dedicated survivors—get the Survivor’s Pack DLC today and fortify your place in the world of Ruins To Fortress!
